alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kingfisher, Oklahoma, north central Cleveland, southwestern Logan and northeastern Canadian Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southern Oklahoma City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Guthrie, Yukon, Bethany, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Harrah, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Valley Brook, Arcadia, and Tinker Air Force Base. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 116 and 154. Interstate 40 between mile markers 143 and 166. Interstate 44 between mile markers 114 and 145. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
